query: Major news about Monad ecosystem - should we take action on trending tokens?

news.title: Monad Achieves 10,000 TPS in Mainnet Performance Test
news.content: The Monad blockchain has demonstrated impressive performance metrics, achieving 10,000 transactions per second in recent mainnet tests. This makes it one of the fastest EVM-compatible chains. Developers are rushing to deploy applications on the network.

news.title: nad.fun Memecoin Platform Sees Record Volume
news.content: The memecoin launchpad nad.fun on Monad has seen record trading volume this week, with over $5M in daily transactions. The platform's bonding curve mechanism has attracted both retail and whale traders.

news.title: Top Crypto Influencer Highlights PEPE Token on Monad
news.content: A prominent crypto influencer with 500K followers has shared analysis of the PEPE token on nad.fun, calling it 'the next 100x opportunity'. The token has seen 300% volume increase following the mention.
